snippet.title: The Secrets Of Hope Trailer
snippet.description:
For fans of Gone Home, That Dragon Cancer and The First Tree. Coming in 2023, The Secrets of Hope explores complex emotions, physical and spiritual struggles and ultimately coming to terms with life and death after being diagnosed with Terminal Cancer.  

Beacons.ai/thesecretsofhope

About the Studio : 
Fyrebite Interactive is a small indie game studio based out of Ohio. Fyrebite Studio focusing on creating games that "dont leave you the same" after playing them. 

Fyrebite Interactive focusing deeply on story driven gameplay and often covering topics and subjects that are often sensitive in the hopes it will provide comfort and understanding.

The Team : 
Josh - Creative Director & Level Design 
Chris - Developer 
Nick - Art and 3d modeling 

#indiegame #cancer #indie
